organizations: Melbourne Caulfield Cup 2015 & Melbourne Cox Plate
title: Melbourne Spring Racing Carnival 2015 Group 1 (itipsports)
text: By itipsports Oct 18, 2015 The 2015 Melbourne Racing Carnival is one of Australia's biggest annual sporting events. Horse breeding, training, and racing have been a part of the Australian way of life for many years, and have also become an integral part of the community and enjoyment of life in Melbourne. With the Melbourne Racing Carnival taking place each year, punters, trainers, and horse enthusiasts alike have a common reason to get together and enjoy some exciting action on the track. Though horse fans are brought out of the woodwork each year with the Melbourne Carnival, there's a heightened anticipation and excitement in the air over this year's racing carnival. Here's Why You Won't Want to Miss the Melbourne Spring Racing Carnival 2015 everything you'll need to know about this spring's most exciting horse racing event, whether you're looking to attend a race, do a little wagering or simply keep up with Australia's most popular sport.The Melbourne Spring Racing Carnival 2015 is the well-attended and prestigious race of the spring season in Australia and it brings together jockeys and sprinters in terms of establishing themselves on the national & international horse racing stag with world-class horse racing action. This major Melbourne horse racing carnival 2015 during the spring is the four-day Melbourne Cup Carnival held at Flemington "$6.175 million Melbourne Cup, Flemington Tuesday 3rd November 2015". The whole event has a carnival like atmosphere which brings the city of Melbourne to life during spring carnival time. The Melbourne Spring Racing Carnival 2015 attracts the best talent and organize the richest, most prestigious racing events.Within the Carnival there is a plethora of Group 1 meetings as follows:$6.175 million Melbourne Cup, Flemington Tuesday 3rd November 2015$1.5 million Victoria Derby, Flemington Saturday 31st October 2015$3 million WS Cox Plate, Moonee Valley Saturday 24th October 2015$3 million Caulfield Cup, Caulfield, Saturday 17th October 2015With more money available for winning, both for the horses in the race and the horse enthusiasts in the stands, the Melbourne Horse Racing Spring Carnival 2015 is arguably the most exciting in its class, and will certainly host the most exciting events of recent years. Novelty paired with traditional successes makes this year's Melbourne Horse Racing spring Carnival well worth your attendance. If you missed the hype and excitement of the Spring Carnival, and get in on the undeniable novelty and excitement!According to itipsports all four major Melbourne metro tracks will feature during the Melbourne Spring Carnival including Flemington, Caulfield, Moonee Valley and Sandown but also there are major Country meetings at Ballarat, Geelong and Bendigo. The Carnival in Melbourne this spring will feature 19 Group 1 races and prize money in the $10's of millions.iTipsports will provide periodic updates through Tips and Melbourne Spring Carnival 2015 futures market updates, to attempt to provide value on chances leading up to and during the Carnival. A value for money sports tipping website focused on horse racing tips in Australia. iTipsports provides expert form summary, ratings and Brisbane, Melbourne and Sydney Horse Racing Tips every Saturday and major race days in Melbourne, Sydney and Brisbane.For Getting More Updates on upcoming Melbourne Caulfield Cup 2015 & Melbourne Cox Plate 2015 racing visits itipsports websites for getting tips and tricks.
